name: Bullet Rain (NiceBug Games)
description:
Play the tutorial!!!!

This game was designed for PC and with 1920x1080 resolution, loading the game can take a bit of time, and some minor frame drops are expected. But it is still enjoyable.
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Bullet Rain is a 2D top-down shmup Bullet Hell game where you have to save earth from invaders. There are all kinds of enemies, and each level has un mid-boss and a level boss.

You have to choose between 3 ships with distinctive stats and power. You can use all 3 on a level but only in the order, you selected. You spawn on a level with the first choice, if you die (3 hits on medium difficulty) you respawn with the second pick, and when you lose all 3... is time to restart the level.
